track.name: Don't Smoke in Bed
comments: An activist as well as an excellent musician, wish I listened to her years ago, she must have been amazing.
legend!
this is still little girl blue
The version of this that played for me was mis-labeled.  I'm not going to COMPLAIN that "Little Girl Blue" played, however, it wasn't don't smoke in bed..,.
good tune to smoke, but not in bed haha
love her
Perfect...
Nina's voice and skills on the piano are utterly hypnotizing.
what's with the capitalised T? annoying
Has anyone got any tips on how to tell a partner 'not to smoke in bed'? As in literarly. How to help them give up tobbacco and replace it with the alternatative 'smokin in bed'?
just. spectacular.
já fumei e isso me rendeu uma boa história pra contar

great voice!
ps. that 'on tour' tag is a bit disturbing since she's benn dead for six years now...
Nina Simone?? Impressed again!! Getting a few surprises here...
i do smoke in bed
amo essa mulher e esta voz, mas eu fumo na cama!
Wonderful soulful singing from the high priestess of the blues.
Her voice massages my tired ears. What beauty. There will never be another Nina.
nina forever
